title: (x) Blanca handbags - Fontdinerdotcom {Santiago}
content:
my friend was asking about this one, does anyone know it? very very much appreciated.   
   
 ![blanca](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822153407im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/11566.gif)
author: aschmidt

comments.content:
hi yves.   
   
hey, didn't you once promise to write me an expository essay on fixed width fonts and what their purpose in life was ; ) ?
I'm pretty sure it's Fontdinerdotcom, just stretched vertically a bit. Good id.

Would fit perfectly into [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822153407/http:/houseind.com/)' [General Collection](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822153407/http:/houseind.com/house.php?kit=GENCOL-FO&sub=view).   
   
Unfortunately, it's not there...
it's freeware, not Font Diner but one of those sites...maybe Blue Vinyl

_\> hey, didn't you once promise to write me an expository essay   
on fixed width fonts and what their purpose in life was ; ) ?_      
   
Dang, that's right! Ouch, what an untrustworthy person   
I am. Or is that _trustworthless_? Anyhoo, I'm finishing this   
annual report that goes to the printer end of this week and   
I'll see if I can whup up something decent. ;P   
   
("what their purpose in life is"? Gee, I'd better shut my   
big trap in the future.)

Whaddayamean, Clem? It _is_ Fontdinerdotcom, like Santiago said.   
Here's a [direct link](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822153407/http:/www.fontdiner.com/fddotcom.sit) to the Mac download file.
